apata as deka labi thibenne eewayin wada ganimataya.wayasa awurudu 12-18 kalayedi as wadath dipthimathwa ha uparima kriyakarithwayakin yuthuwa kriya karana athara penimath itha niwaradiya.awurudu 35-40 pamana wana wita sharirayen labena poshanaya adu wela aswala penime gunathmaka bhawaya adu wenawa.ganna ahara pana,bona wathura pramanaya,kalagunaya,jiwath wana pradeshaya,samaja gatum,jiwana ratawa ha wadihiti wayase athiwana bowana ha bonowana roga thathwa, prathishakthikarana hakiyawa yana dewal ee sandaha balapanawa.enam daridrathawaya nisa nisi poshanayak nolabi yamen mema thathwaya athi wuwath warthamanaye minisunge poshana thathwaya sapekshawa honda mattamaka pawathina nisa menma honda prathishakthikarana wadapiliwelawal pawathina nisa eya etharam balapamak athi karanne naha.wayasa awurudu 40 pamana wana wita ape shariraye pariwruththiya kriyawali adu wimath samanga asata sapayana poshanaya adu wi ase kachaye ghana wima nathnam suda athiwima sidu wenawa.ee kalayedi suda athi wimata hethu rashiyak balapana athara eewayin pradhana wanne wijalanayayi.pramanawath paridi jalaya panaya nokirimen,awata parisaraye ushnathwaya wadi wimath wijalanaya athi wimata hethu wenawa.ema nisa ase suda itha ikmanin athi wenawa.
